ea1x ea1y ea2x ea2y eb1x eb1y eb2x eb2y
t1a = ea1x * ea2y
t1b = ea2x * ea1y
t1 = t1a - t1b
tx2 = eb1x - eb2x
t3a = eb1x * eb2y
t3b = eb2x * eb1y
t3 = t3a - t3b
tx4 = ea1x - ea2x
ty2 = eb1y - eb2y
ty4 = ea1y - ea2y
lxa = t1 * tx2
lxb = t3 * tx4
lambda_x = lxa - lxb
lya = t1 * ty2
lyb = t3 * ty4
lambda_y = lya - lyb
deta = tx4 * ty2
detb = tx2 * ty4
lambda_det = deta - detb
